text: are you looking for a really easy treat

it's not a classic fudge you don't have

cup of granulated sugar stir the sugar
into your cream have it over a medium
medium-high heat add 1 in 3/4 cups of
mini marshmallows or you can cut up the
regular-sized marshmallows into small
pieces and then measure 1 and 3/4 cups
and then 3 tablespoons of unsalted
butter and 1/2 a teaspoon of coarse salt
super easy already right thing I love

stirring though because marshmallow is
sticky and it can burn on the bottom of
the pot which would ruin your whole
batch and I would not be happy if that
happened to me when your mixture has
been boiling for five minutes
turn it off add one and a half cups of
chocolate chips these are semi-sweet
chocolate chips half a cup of chopped
walnuts and a half a teaspoon of vanilla
extract budges almost done stir it until
the chocolate completely melts you don't
have to do this on the stove just
remember the heat is now off it gets

smooth out the top and then top with a
